title: Detemine if Multipliable
text: Two matrices are Multipliable(able to be multiplied) if their inner dimensions are the same. Since C is 3x2 and B is 2x2, the matrices can be multiplied.

title: Following the Algorithm
text: Follow the algorithm for multiplying matrices to get the final matrix.

title: Operations For Multiplication
text: The operations for multiplying the matrices are as follows: $$\begin{bmatrix} -1\times-10+0\times5 & -1\times20+0\times25 \\ 0\times-10+-1\times5 & 0\times20+-1\times25 \\ 1\times-10+0\times5 & 1\times20+0\times25 \end{bmatrix}$$.

title: Simplifying the Matrix
text: Simplify these $$operations:\begin{bmatrix} -1\times-10+0\times5 & -1\times20+0\times25 \\ 0\times-10+-1\times5 & 0\times20+-1\times25 \\ 1\times-10+0\times5 & 1\times20+0\times25 \end{bmatrix}$$. What do you get as your final answer?
